MeasurementToolMetadata.Description: Mini-International Neuropsychiatric Interview - Part N: Anxiety

mini_n1a.Description: Mini-International Neuropsychiatric Interview: N1a - Have you felt anxious or worried over the last 6 months?

mini_n1b1.Description: Mini-International Neuropsychiatric Interview: N1b1 - Are these anxieties or worries present most days?

mini_n1b2.Description: Mini-International Neuropsychiatric Interview: N1b2 - Can these anxieties or worries be explained by another disorder?

mini_n2.Description: Mini-International Neuropsychiatric Interview: N2 - Is it difficult to control these anxieties/worries?

mini_n3a.Description: Mini-International Neuropsychiatric Interview: N3a - Over 6m: Restless, keyed up or on edge?

mini_n3b.Description: Mini-International Neuropsychiatric Interview: N3b - Over 6m:  Muscle tension?

mini_n3c.Description: Mini-International Neuropsychiatric Interview: N3c - Over 6m: Tired or exhausted?

mini_n3d.Description: Mini-International Neuropsychiatric Interview: N3d - Over 6m: Difficulty concentrating?

mini_n3e.Description: Mini-International Neuropsychiatric Interview: N3e - Over 6m: Irritable?

mini_n3f.Description: Mini-International Neuropsychiatric Interview: N3f - Over 6m: Difficulty sleeping?

mini_n4.Description: Mini-International Neuropsychiatric Interview: N4 - Symptoms caused functional impairment?

mini_n_diagnosis_anxiety.Description: Mini-International Neuropsychiatric Interview: N - Fulfils diagnostic criteria for generalised anxiety disorder?
